Text: A/V is decent for a CAM! It does come in multiple .RAR files which will all sync together once downloaded. Virus free and is playing on VLC with synced audio. Thank you.

yea this was excellent for a cam, anyone know why it flickers for a few seconds here and there other than that i got 0 complaints about this, audio was pretty good, picture was amazing for a cam (whoever on the IMAGiNE team who upgraded their cam, props to you!)  Using it right now for a cleaned up version altho this didnt need a whole lot.
A=8 V=7 . Good enough to watch comfortably . Some blurry screens , but well worth the download . Cheers .
